ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 15 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon D5200 24.1 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) - Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR NIKKOR Zoom Lens - Bower SFD728N Fully Automatic TTL Flash - Telephoto & Wide Angle Lens Set
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap - 52mm UV Protection Filter - Focus 5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - Free 25 Quality Prints
